name: expense-tracker-interview
description: A simple expense tracking application built with React, TypeScript, Node.js, and SQLite.

scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.test:coverage:html: npm run test:coverage:backend:html && npm run test:coverage:frontend:html
scripts.test:coverage:backend:html: cd backend && npx vitest run --coverage || true && npx c8 report --reporter=html --reports-dir=coverage --temp-directory=coverage/.tmp
scripts.test:coverage:frontend:html: cd frontend && npx vitest run --coverage || true && npx c8 report --reporter=html --reports-dir=coverage --temp-directory=coverage/.tmp
